UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsInterestOnIncomeT.description: Amount of interest expense for an underpayment of income taxes.

UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsPeriodIncreaseDec.label: Unrecognized Tax Benefits, Period Increase (Decrease)
UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsPeriodIncreaseDec.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in unrecognized tax benefits attributable to uncertain tax positions taken in tax returns.

UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsReductionsResulti.label: Unrecognized Tax Benefits, Reduction Resulting from Lapse of Applicable Statute of Limitations
UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsReductionsResulti.description: Amount of decrease in unrecognized tax benefits resulting from lapses of applicable statutes of limitations.

UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsThatWouldImpactEf.label: Unrecognized Tax Benefits that Would Impact Effective Tax Rate
UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsThatWouldImpactEf.description: The total amount of unrecognized tax benefits that, if recognized, would affect the effective tax rate.

ValuationAllowanceAmount.label: Valuation Allowance, Amount (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
ValuationAllowanceAmount.description: The amount of the valuation allowance recorded as of the balance sheet date pertaining to the specified deferred tax asset for which an assessment was made that it is more likely than not that all or a portion of such deferred tax asset will not be realized through related deductions on future tax returns.

ValuationAllowanceDeferredTaxAssetChange.label: Valuation Allowance, Deferred Tax Asset, Increase (Decrease), Amount
ValuationAllowanceDeferredTaxAssetChange.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in the valuation allowance for a specified deferred tax asset.

VariableLeaseCost.label: Variable Lease, Cost
VariableLeaseCost.description: Amount of variable lease cost, excluded from lease liability, recognized when obligation for payment is incurred for finance and operating leases.

WeightedAverageNumberOfDilutedSharesOuts.label: Weighted Average Number of Shares Outstanding, Diluted
WeightedAverageNumberOfDilutedSharesOuts.description: The average number of shares or units issued and outstanding that are used in calculating diluted EPS or earnings per unit (EPU), determined based on the timing of issuance of shares or units in the period.

WeightedAverageNumberOfSharesOutstanding.label: Weighted Average Number of Shares Outstanding, Basic
WeightedAverageNumberOfSharesOutstanding.description: Number of [basic] shares or units, after adjustment for contingently issuable shares or units and other shares or units not deemed outstanding, determined by relating the portion of time within a reporting period that common shares or units have been outstanding to the total time in that period.

DebtInstrumentUnamortizedDiscountPremium.label: Debt Instrument, Unamortized Discount (Premium) and Debt Issuance Costs, Net
DebtInstrumentUnamortizedDiscountPremium.description: Amount of unamortized debt discount (premium) and debt issuance costs.

GainLossOnSaleOfOtherInvestments.label: Gain (Loss) on Sale of Other Investments
GainLossOnSaleOfOtherInvestments.description: Amount of gain (loss) included in earnings for investments classified as other.

GoodwillPeriodIncreaseDecrease.label: Goodwill, Period Increase (Decrease)
GoodwillPeriodIncreaseDecrease.description: Amount of increase (decrease) of an asset representing future economic benefits arising from other assets acquired in a business combination that are not individually identified and separately recognized.

IncomeTaxReconciliationTaxSettlements.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Tax Settlement, Amount
IncomeTaxReconciliationTaxSettlements.description: Amount of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to income tax settlements. Including, but not limited to, domestic tax settlement, foreign tax settlement, state and local tax settlement, and other tax settlements.

InvestmentIncomeInterest.label: Investment Income, Interest
InvestmentIncomeInterest.description: Amount before accretion (amortization) of purchase discount (premium) of interest income on nonoperating securities.

LongTermDebt.label: Long-term Debt
LongTermDebt.description: Amount, after unamortized (discount) premium and debt issuance costs, of long-term debt. Includes, but not limited to, notes payable, bonds payable, debentures, mortgage loans and commercial paper. Excludes capital lease obligations.

LongTermDebtFairValue.label: Long-term Debt, Fair Value
LongTermDebtFairValue.description: The fair value amount of long-term debt whether such amount is presented as a separate caption or as a parenthetical disclosure. Additionally, this element may be used in connection with the fair value disclosures required in the footnote disclosures to the financial statements. The element may be used in both the balance sheet and disclosure in the same submission.

OtherNonoperatingExpense.label: Other Nonoperating Expense
OtherNonoperatingExpense.description: Amount of expense related to nonoperating activities, classified as other.

OtherNonoperatingIncome.label: Other Nonoperating Income
OtherNonoperatingIncome.description: Amount of income related to nonoperating activities, classified as other.

PaymentsOfDebtIssuanceCosts.label: Payments of Debt Issuance Costs
PaymentsOfDebtIssuanceCosts.description: The cash outflow paid to third parties in connection with debt origination, which will be amortized over the remaining maturity period of the associated long-term debt.

ProceedsFromDebtNetOfIssuanceCosts.label: Proceeds from Debt, Net of Issuance Costs
ProceedsFromDebtNetOfIssuanceCosts.description: The cash inflow from additional borrowings, net of cash paid to third parties in connection with debt origination.

StockRepurchasedDuringPeriodValue.label: Stock Repurchased During Period, Value
StockRepurchasedDuringPeriodValue.description: Equity impact of the value of stock that has been repurchased during the period and has not been retired and is not held in treasury. Some state laws may mandate the circumstances under which an entity may acquire its own stock and prescribe the accounting treatment therefore. This element is used when state law does not recognize treasury stock.

TreasuryStockRetiredCostMethodAmount.label: Treasury Stock, Retired, Cost Method, Amount
TreasuryStockRetiredCostMethodAmount.description: Amount of decrease of par value, additional paid in capital (APIC) and retained earnings of common and preferred stock retired from treasury when treasury stock is accounted for under the cost method.

TreasuryStockSharesRetired.label: Treasury Stock, Shares, Retired
TreasuryStockSharesRetired.description: Number of shares of common and preferred stock retired from treasury during the period.
